# function: manifest_decode

Given a YAML text containing a Kubernetes manifest, will decode and return an object representation of that resource.



## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
manifest_decode(manifest string, validate bool...) dynamic
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `manifest` (String) The YAML text for a Kubernetes manifest
<!-- variadic argument generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `validate` (Variadic, Boolean) Whether to validate the manifest has required Kubernetes fields (apiVersion, kind, metadata). Defaults to true.
